description: Mina.NET is the .NET implementation of Apache MINA, a network application framework which helps users develop high performance and high scalability network applications easily. It provides an abstract event-driven asynchronous API over various transports such as TCP/IP via async socket.
releaseNotes:
* 2.0.7.1 - Added test for KeepAliveFilter
*           Fixed incorrect IoEventType
*           Fixed incorrect method calls in socket transport
* 2.0.7   - First release based on Apache MINA 2.0.7
*           Unified yet simple API for various transport types:
*            - TCP/IP & UDP/IP via .NET asynchronous socket
*            - serial communication
*            - loopback (in-application pipe)
*           Extensible filters
*           Low-level and high-level API:
*            - low-level: uses IoBuffers
*            - high-level: uses user-defined message objects and codecs
*           Highly customizable thread model
*           Out-of-the-box SSL Â· TLS
*           Overload shielding & traffic throttling
*           Stream-based I/O support via StreamIoHandler
*           Tested
title: Mina.NET
